Archetype Feature Description: You can use your action to briefly control elemental forces within 30 feet of you, causing one of the following effects of your choice:

Options: Create a harmless, instantaneous sensory effect related to air, earth, fire, or water such as a shower of sparks, a puff of wind, a spray of light mist, or a gentle rumbling of stone.
Instantaneously light or snuff out a candle, a torch, or a small campfire.
Chill or warm up to 1 pound of nonliving material for up to 1 hour.
Cause earth, fire, water, or mist that can fit within a 1-foot cube to shape itself into a crude form you designate for 1 minute.

Archetype Feature Description: You can spend 3 ki points to cast Hold Person.
You can spend 4 ki points to cast Gaseous Form, targeting yourself.
You can spend 4 ki points to cast Fireball.
You can spend 6 ki points to cast Wall of Stone.
You can spend 6 ki points to cast Cone of Cold.
You can spend 5 ki points to cast Stoneskin, targeting yourself.
You can spend 5 ki points to cast Wall of Fire.
